Uses of Package
javax.mail.search

Packages that use javax.mail.search
com.sun.mail.imap An IMAP protocol provider for the JavaMail API that provides access to an IMAP message store. 
javax.mail The JavaMailTM API provides classes that model a mail system. 
javax.mail.search Message search terms for the JavaMail API. 
 

Classes in javax.mail.search used by com.sun.mail.imap
SearchTerm
          Search criteria are expressed as a tree of search-terms, forming a parse-tree for the search expression.
 

Classes in javax.mail.search used by javax.mail
SearchTerm
          Search criteria are expressed as a tree of search-terms, forming a parse-tree for the search expression.
 

Classes in javax.mail.search used by javax.mail.search
AddressStringTerm
          This abstract class implements string comparisons for Message addresses.
AddressTerm
          This class implements Message Address comparisons.
ComparisonTerm
          This class models the comparison operator.
DateTerm
          This class implements comparisons for Dates
IntegerComparisonTerm
          This class implements comparisons for integers.
SearchTerm
          Search criteria are expressed as a tree of search-terms, forming a parse-tree for the search expression.
StringTerm
          This class implements the match method for Strings.
